attributes.action: Keep Peppa Pig cartoon on Childrens TV
attributes.additional_details:
Please keep this much loved carton on children's TV.  A Muslim father wants to have it banned.  Why should all children have to be penalised because of a few.

If a TV programme offends then there is always the choice of switching off or changing channels.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Channel 5.   However, it has been suggested that this was a hoax.
